cause.description:
If u have wonderful gr8 frndz who've been alwayz by ur side in gd and bad u gotta sign up 4 this... If u don't have any u can meet some over here
1. i'm surrounded by angels i call them frndz!
2. i'll alwayz be the 1 by ur side!
3. 2 the world u may be 1 person but 2 1 person ur the world!
cause.mission: count how many ppl on fb has bffs and if not they can meet over here!!!
cause.name: Bffs
